gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem

Class SemanticItemFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem.SemanticItemFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoreferenceSemanticItemFactory

    public class SemanticItemFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory class to instantiate semantic items. Semantic objects are associated with a Document object and they are stored as a map. The key of the map is a semantic class (e.g., Entity. class) and the value for this key is the set of entities associated with the document.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

      • getNextId

        public int getNextId(java.lang.Class<? extends SemanticItem> type)
        Gets the next available identifier for the given semantic class, by incrementing the counter.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the next available identifier

      • newEntity

        public Entity newEntity(Document doc,
                        TermAnnotation term)
        Creates a new Entity from a standoff Term annotation object.

        It attempts to attach concepts to the entity object, if Reference annotations associated with the Term annotation is found.

        Parameters:
        doc - the document the term is associated with
        term - the TermAnnotation object corresponding to the term
        Returns:
        the new Entity object, null if unsuccessful with creating/retrieving the corresponding textual unit

      • newEntity

        public Entity newEntity(Document doc,
                        SpanList sp,
                        SpanList headSp,
                        java.lang.String type,
                        java.util.Set<Concept> concs,
                        Concept sense)
        Creates a new Entity object with the given span and ontological information.

        It does not check whether concept, sense information is valid.

        Parameters:
        doc - the document the term is associated with
        sp - the span of the term
        headSp - the span of the head of the term
        type - the semantic type of the term
        concs - the concepts associated with the term
        sense - the relevant sense
        Returns:
        the new Entity object, null if unsuccessful with creating/retrieving the corresponding textual unit

      • newEntity

                        SpanList sp,

        sp - the span of the term

      • newPredicate

        public Predicate newPredicate(Document doc,
                              TermAnnotation t)
        Creates a new Predicate from a Term standoff annotation.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document the predicate is associated with
        t - the TermAnnotation object corresponding to the term
        Returns:
        the new Predicate object, null if unsuccessful with creating/retrieving the corresponding textual unit

      • newPredicate

        public Predicate newPredicate(Document doc,
                              SpanList sp,
                              SpanList headSp,
                              Indicator ind,
                              Sense sem)
        Creates a new Predicate object with the given span and indicator information.

        If no indicator information is provided, it still creates an object. This may not be such a great idea. In such cases, it sets the semantic type to be OTHER.

        Parameters:
        doc - the document the predicate is associated with
        sp - the span of the predicate
        headSp - the span of the predicate head
        ind - the indicator for the predicate
        sem - the relevant sense
        Returns:
        the new Predicate object, null if unsuccessful with creating/retrieving the corresponding textual unit

      • newPredicate

        public Predicate newPredicate(Document doc,
                              SpanList sp,
                              SpanList headSp,
                              java.lang.String type)
        Creates a new Predicate object with the given span and type information.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document the predicate is associated with
        sp - the span of the predicate
        headSp - the span of the predicate head
        type - the semantic type of the predicate
        Returns:
        the new Predicate object, null if unsuccessful with creating/retrieving the corresponding textual unit

      • newPredication

        public Predication newPredication(Document doc,
                                  Predicate predicate,
                                  java.util.List<Argument> args,
                                  java.util.List<ScalarModalityValue> scalarValues,
                                  java.util.List<SemanticItem> sources)
        Creates a new Predication object.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document the predication is associated with
        predicate - the predicate of the predication
        args - the list of arguments
        scalarValues - the scalar modality values associated with the predication
        sources - the sources the predication is attributed to
        Returns:
        a new Predication object, null if predicate or arguments are null or invalid.

        Parameters:
        doc - the document the relation is associated with
        type - the relation type
        args - the list of arguments
        Returns:
        a new ImplicitRelation object, null if a relation cannot be instantiated.

        public Event newEvent(Document doc,
                      EventAnnotation ev)
        Creates a new Event object from a Event standoff annotation.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document the event is associated with
        ev - the corresponding EventAnnotation object
        Returns:
        a new Event object, null if predicate is null.

                                  java.lang.String type,
                                  Predicate pred,
                                  java.util.Set<SemanticItem> sis)
        Creates a Conjunction object with an explicit predicate.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document
        type - the semantic type to assign
        pred - the predicate indicator for the conjunction
        sis - the conjunct semantic objects
        Returns:
        a Conjunction object

      • newModification

        public Modification newModification(Document doc,
                                    ModificationAnnotation ann)
        Creates a new Modification object from a standoff annotation. Returns null if the modified semantic object cannot be identified.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document the modification is associated with
        ann - the corresponding ModificationAnnotation object
        Returns:
        a new Modification object

      • newModification

        public Modification newModification(Document doc,
                                    java.lang.String type,
                                    java.util.List<Argument> args)
        Creates a new Modification object.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document the modification is associated with
        type - type of the modification, Negation, Speculation, Factuality, etc.
        args - the argument list of the modification
        Returns:
        a new Modification object.
